text:
Hi Everyone!

I'm David, and I'm delighted to join the superpath community. I am an expert graphics designer, Video editor, and motion graphics designer. I have worked with a lot of brands and companies. Let's chat if you want to do something together.

Looking forward to connecting with everyone :smiley:

text:
Hi all! :wave::skin-tone-4: I’m Christina, originally from Boston, but living in Europe since 2005! I’m an independent Digital Marketing consultant with 15+ years experience helping early-stage (or marketing immature) B2B organizations implement inbound content-based growth strategies. I also help them build the marketing teams they need to excel at doing this sustainably.

Looking forward to connecting with this online community of amazing freelancers and marketeers.

I started my career as a content marketer in the HR space, so I love to geek out on all things company culture, building winning teams and generally making the workplace a better place for everyone!

More about me: <https://www.branchoutconsulting.net/>

text:
Hi all —

I’m Claire and I’m a content writer/strategist, currently at Built Technologies. Built is a fintech company focused on improving the flow of funds throughout the construction ecosystem. We’re currently in the process of increasing our thought leadership presence and improving our content strategy.

Looking forward to connecting with & learning from this group!

text: Hi everyone! :bouquet: I’m Allie, a freelance creative doing everything from social media management and content creation to all types of brand design collateral. I am currently working with three amazing brands in the beverage :ice_cube: startup space. I am extremely excited to be a part of this group, please reach out if yall would like to chat content, design, bev, whatever!

text:
Hi everyone!

I’m Saps, cofounder of Airboxr—a no-code analytics tool for DTC businesses. I write about no-code, entrepreneurship etc. Find me on <https://twitter.com/saptarshinath|Twitter> and <https://www.linkedin.com/in/saptarshinath|LinkedIn> too.

Looking forward to learning from everyone here.

text: Hey folks! I'm David and I'm (currently) a staff writer at Campfire Labs. (I think there's a few of us in here already.) In the next few weeks, I'm hanging up my keyboard to move into an internal marketing role.

text: Hello everyone! I’m Sarah :wave: I’m a freelance content writer/strategist with 7+ years experience. My focus is pharma, healthcare, energy, and tech, but I’ve managed content campaigns for a wide variety of B2B clients and industries. Excited to connect with all of you!

elements.text: Hello everyone! I’m Sarah

I’m a freelance content writer/strategist with 7+ years experience. My focus is pharma, healthcare, energy, and tech, but I’ve managed content campaigns for a wide variety of B2B clients and industries. Excited to connect with all of you!

text:
Hi, all. I'm' a content jack-of-all-trades, working mostly in the B2B space, but also some B2C in finance and tech. I've supported a range of content teams at business media, agencies, and corporate entities as a writer, editor, strategy consultant, and project manager.

I've written everything from management consulting thought leadership to congressional testimony about gender equity to social media copy for one of the stars of Queer Eye. (What a strange way we've chosen to make a living.) I did pass on the opportunity to ghostwrite a letter to help a guy win back his wife. Too much pressure.

Looking forward to getting to know the folks here, learning, networking, and helping out where I can.

elements.text:

I've written everything from management consulting thought leadership to congressional testimony about gender equity to social media copy for one of the stars of Queer Eye. (What a strange way we've chosen to make a living.) I did pass on the opportunity to ghostwrite a letter to help a guy win back his wife. Too much pressure.

text:
Hi, all. I work as a copywriter and editor. I've built and sold multiple online businesses of the past decade and use my knowledge and experiences to make content on YT and other platforms to help online business owners live happier and healthier lives while providing tips for building and growing a fulfilling online business/career.

I can tell there is an amazing group of people here and I'm excited to meet you all. :)
